refsect1.title: Container Database Implementation
refsect1.para: A program can collect media database records in a container database, allowing logical playlists (DAAP) or albums (DPAP). Creating a container database is a matter of implementing the DmapContainerDb and DmapContainerRecord interfaces. For an example of this, see libdmapsharing's test-dmap-container-db.c and test-dmap-container-record.c.
